review_title: Fantastic company with great ethos to clients and staff
pros: Great support and inspirational teams. Amazing moral and a real sense of all pulling together . Clients are at the heart of everything the Wallich do, and the company values are not just words, but aimed for every day
cons: Sometimes, due to issues with funding, projects can take a while to get underway.

pros: Helping people who are homeless is fulfilling. Some lovely staff and an humanitarian work ethos in frontline roles which was inspiring.
cons: I remember them reducing salaries and getting employees to reapply for posts then offering them their posts with a 5000 reduction in pay. While this was happening the managers had pay rises, when asked why this was happening I was told it was because there were so many complaints about the salary drops that the managers now had a higher workload and more responsibility! It’s run like a hierarchical business and NOT a charity! Just look at their head office.
